TopicTitle: The Tale of the Griffin's First Flight [BIG IMAGES]

Articles.Content: The Griffin is a manned Dragon-like spacecraft. It is meant to be used to dock with the Orion space station. After some failures, the Griffin left the launchpad. It's crew was Jeb, Bill, and Deswig (I think). They got into an orbit similar to the Orion's, but weren't close enough to them. After many maneuvers, it turned out the Griffin wouldn't be able to dock without risky fuel use. They were de-orbited, and returned safely to Kerbin. Now, some pictures of the mission.
